In his keynote at the DLD Conference in Germany, Google's outgoing chief executive Eric Schmidt announced his company's intent to expand its European presence. Our businesses are doing very well around the globe, and as a result I'm happy to announce we'll be adding 1,000 new employees in Europe and make some significant investments, explained Eric Schmidt .`` Hundreds of these people will be located right here in our technology center in Munich.'' Details regarding salaried performance awards are considered confidential employment records, Ranieri said. Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne has said the workers deserve bonuses even though the company lost money because of work they did in revamping or redesigning 16 models since the 2009 bankruptcy.
